CustomField.description: Allows projects to specify a list of recipients that will be defaulted for the eSignature. To use this option, projects will add "DocuSign Default Recipients" related list on the Proposal and user will specify the list for each Proposal
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Allows projects to specify a list of recipients that will be defaulted for the eSignature. To use this option, projects will add "DocuSign Default Recipients" related list on the Proposal and user will specify the list for each Proposal
CustomField.label: Auto-Select multiple recipients?
